text: Any potterheads still upp?? Bhai aaj fir se harry potter dekh li it's more than ten times now aur jab bhi dekho bc hamesha pehli baar jitta hi intrest aata h üò≠ Well I really admire that trio but I'm jealous at the same time, asal jeevan me aisa kuch nai hora kya? Hermione jaisi ladkiyaan kahaan milti hain...üêí and being straight ofc hermoine's my fav, tumhara fav kon h????

Civic Sense is extinct This happened with me yesterday At Santacruz west SV road after coming out of Milan subway. After I turned right from the signal on my bike, I see two guys coming on the wrong side and we almost collided after I took the turn. And in that situation I yelled at the guy for coming on the wrong side as we could have had a nasty collision. To which both these guys were like "Arey sab log wrong side se jaate hai" and started hurling abuses and was almost on the verge of beating

Delhi Police Jo Jo Vaibhav Rang Sadiya uska paise kha rahe ho Delhi Police Kaise khati hai traffic police Gramin Seva Walon Ko paise khate Sab chala rahe hain aur ka Koi badhiya gadi Kahin Bhi chal rahi hai number plate Mein Gurjar likha hai Fir Bhi gadi chal rahi hai vah Delhi Police Itni bhrasht Hai Gurjar likha hai Bullet per unko Kuchh Nahin kar pa rahe hain Garib aadami gadi per rukva ke kar rahe hain

Mujhe ye samjh ni ata,, ring road par pahle kam dikkat thi lya traffic ki, jo aap logo ne model town se leke kashmiri gate tak sabhi u turn band krdie,, kya soch ke kia aap logo ne ye sab,, logo ko kitti dikkat face karni pad rahi hai, time khrab ho raha hai, fuel khrb ho rha h,na jane kitni ambulances jam me ghnato fassi padi hai,, descision to ap logo ne lelia h, pr ek baar aake bhi dekho kitni pareshan ho rahi hai duniya,,, I request you sir/madam,, ye descision jo b lia hai aapne isko thoda
